definition: you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: Hello. This is the Yanhua Fenghuang Hospital. May I see your passport please.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是燕化凤凰医院，请出示您的护照。

sentences.english: Hello, My name is Tessa and I live in Karachi .
sentences.chinese: 您好，我的名字是泰莎和我住在卡拉奇。

sentences.english: Where does your nickname come from?
sentences.chinese: 您好，看到您的高评，甚为好奇？

sentences.english: Sorry, the number you dail is busy now. Please dail it again later.
sentences.chinese: 您好，您所拨打的电话正忙，请稍后再拨。

sentences.english: Hello, is that the telephone office ?
Hi. I'm looking for a gift for my niece.
sentences.chinese: 您好，我想为我侄女挑一件礼物。
您好，杰出，图形设计师在那里。

sentences.english: Hi, are you the Eagle Brand Ceramics?
sentences.chinese: 您好，你们是鹰牌陶瓷公司吗？

sentences.english: Hello, this is the Foreign Affairs Police.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是台北市警局外事处。

sentences.english: Yan Hello, there is such a problem would like to begin your interview.
sentences.chinese: 阎先生您好，有这样的问题，首先要你的采访。

sentences.english: Hi, are you a dragon net member?
sentences.chinese: 您好，您是龙网的会员吗？

sentences.english: Hello, please login now to re-try the game.
sentences.chinese: 您好，请您现在重新登陆游戏。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I need to go to Taipei World Trade Center, but I don't know where to get off.
sentences.chinese: 您好，我想去台北世贸中心，但不知道要在哪站下？

sentences.english: P1: Hi, sit down here please. What can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 您好，请坐这儿，我能为您做什么？

sentences.english: Welcome to Shanghai South Railway Station.
sentences.chinese: 您好，欢迎您来上海南站。

definition: you (courteous, as opposed to informal 你[ni3])
to say hello to/to send one's regards to
we are honored by your presence
what is your surname?/(May I ask) your surname?
I have been looking forward to meeting you for a long time (idiom)
